data.event: The United States Census Bureau estimated its 2011 population at 329,427, making Santa Ana the 57th most-populous city in the United States.
Founded in 1869, the city is part of the Greater Los Angeles Area, the second largest metropolitan area in the United States with almost 18 million residents in 2010.
In 2011 Forbes ranked Santa Ana the fourth-safest city of over 250,000 residents in the United States.
